casebody.data:
Charles H. MEARS, Plaintiff, v. J. M. GIDDING & CO., Inc., Defendant, and Jessie Farquharson and Margaret Wheelock, Appellants. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. June 1, 1925.) No. 374. Simpson, Thacher & Bartlett, of New York City (Louis Connick and Fred Bielaski, both of New York City, óf counsel), for appellants. Rosenberg & Ball, of New York City (Godfrey Goldmark and Ralph F. Colin, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before, HOUGH and MAN-TON, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

There is no difference in legal effect between this case and that of Heineman, etc., Corporation v. Nat Levy & Co., 6 F.(2d) 970, opinion filed in this court April 6, 1925. On the authority of that case, the order below is reversed, with costs.
